Replace.Text: After recruiting or patronizing a [ICON_GreatPerson] Great Person, 25% of its [ICON_GreatPerson] Great Person point cost is refunded.

Your [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes to other civilizations provide +6 [ICON_Gold] Gold for Egypt. Other civilizations' [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes to Egypt provide +2 [ICON_Food] Food for them and +2 [ICON_Gold] Gold for Egypt.

+10 [ICON_Faith] Faith for each civilization (including India) they have met that has founded a Religion and is not currently at war. Opposing civilizations receive double the war weariness for fighting against Gandhi.
When building Ancient, Classical and Medieval wonders you may spend Builder charges to complete 15% of the original wonder cost. Builders receive an additional charge.

Automatically receive the final Great Prophet when the next-to-last one is claimed (if you have not earned a Great Prophet already). +2 [ICON_Science] Science and +2 [ICON_Culture] Culture for each foreign city following Arabia's Religion.
+25% [ICON_Production] Production towards districts and wonders if placed next to a River. Floodplains do not block placement of districts and wonders.
+30% [ICON_Production] Production toward Medieval, Renaissance, and Industrial era wonders. [ICON_Tourism] Tourism from wonders of any era is doubled.

+2 [ICON_Food] Food, +2 [ICON_Production] Production, and +4 [ICON_Gold] Gold from each [ICON_GreatWork_Relic] Relic, [ICON_GreatWork_Artifact] Artifact, and Sculpture [ICON_GreatWork_Sculpture] Great Work of Art in addition to the usual [ICON_Culture] Culture. Palace has slots for 5 Great Works.
招募或赞助一位 [ICON_GreatPerson] 伟人后，将返还所消耗 [ICON_GreatPerson] 伟人点数的25%。
您前往其他文明的 [ICON_TradeRoute] 贸易路线为埃及+6 [ICON_Gold] 金币。其他文明来埃及的 [ICON_TradeRoute] 贸易路线能为他们+2 [ICON_Food] 食物，为埃及+2 [ICON_Gold] 金币。
当遇见的每个已创建了宗教且不在战争状态下的文明（包括印度）获得+10信仰值 [ICON_Faith] 。与甘地交战的文明获得双倍厌战情绪。
建造远古、古典和中世纪奇观时，可以消耗建造者劳动力来推进15%的奇观建造进程。建造者会获得额外建造劳动力。
当倒数第二个大预言家被招募后（如果您尚未获得大预言家），则自动获得最后一个大预言家。可从每座信奉阿拉伯宗教的外国城市+2 [ICON_Science] 科技值和+2 [ICON_Culture] 文化值。
区域和奇观可建在泛滥平原上，如建在河边则+25% [ICON_Production] 生产力。
为中世纪、文艺复兴时期和工业时代的奇观+30% [ICON_Production] 生产力。 所有奇观的 [ICON_Tourism] 旅游业绩都翻倍。
除了通常的 [ICON_Culture] 文化值，还会从每个 [ICON_GreatWork_Relic] 遗物、 [ICON_GreatWork_Artifact] 文物以及 [ICON_GreatWork_Sculpture] 艺术巨作中获得+2 [ICON_Food] 食物、+2 [ICON_Science] 科技值、+4 [ICON_Gold] 金币。宫殿有5个巨作槽位。
